document.stem: The Wi-Fi card in the Advanced View displays:
document.li1: The status of the Wi-Fi interface
The network names (SSIDs) used by the Wi-Fi access points
document.p: To open the Wi-Fi page, click the Wi-Fi card in the Advanced View .
The menu on the left allows you to select the access point for which you want to make changes. When you select an access point, its settings will be grouped in the following sections:
